itunes:summary:
Former TMZ paparazzi Dax Holt and Adam Glyn talk about their craziest interactions with celebrities including getting punched in the head by one of Drake’s entourage, dancing with Beyonce in a music video, being confronted by Scientology security, and Shaq explaining why he only pees in bathroom stalls in public restrooms.
